# Ramaris

> Ramaris is a platform for discovering, tracking, and analyzing on-chain wallet activity on Base and other EVM blockchains.

Ramaris helps users monitor smart money movements, create automated trading strategies, and receive real-time notifications when wallets they follow make trades.

## Core Features

- **Wallet Tracking**: Monitor any blockchain wallet's trading activity in real-time
- **Strategy Creation**: Build custom monitoring rules with filters for transaction value, timing, and more
- **Signal Notifications**: Get instant alerts via Telegram, email, or push notifications
- **Leaderboard Discovery**: Find profitable wallets through win rate and PnL rankings
- **Token Analytics**: View detailed token metrics, holder analysis, and price charts

- [Browse Strategies](/browse/strategies) - Discover copy-trading strategies

- [Browse Tokens](/browse/tokens) - Explore trending tokens on Base
- [Pricing](/pricing) - Subscription plans and features

## Technical Details

- **Supported Chains**: Base (primary), with more EVM chains coming
- **Data Sources**: On-chain data via Moralis, Alchemy; prices via DexPaprika
- **API**: REST API with free tier (100 req/hr, strategies). Full access on Pro+
- **Notifications**: Telegram, email, push notifications, webhooks

- Website: https://www.ramaris.app
